episode_event_academy_ch0245_ch0148_ch02:
Pasio Academy... I’m liking the new feel of
this school!

They’re offering classes on the cultures and
characteristics of the different regions, too!

I’m sure that’s made possible by all the people
and Pokémon from across the world who’ve
gathered here on Pasio—an island of dreams!

We have to thank Director Clavell and everyone
from Team Star who helped kick-start it!

I’d like to do more than just attend classes,
though—like some extracurricular stuff!

I just got to Pasio, so I can make more friends
that way!
Then the only thing to do is start your own club!
So much to learn!
Your class was so interesting, Morty!

Hearing comments like that makes being a teacher
all the more worthwhile!
I need to have Jacq teach me more!

The teachers are studyin’ too, eh? Just like us
students!
Club activities, huh? Sounds fun!
Right?!
Hm? How do I know Florian?

We were in the same class the other day. I got my
Cyclizar from Florian, too!

Hearing her dream of livening up her hometown in
Galar made me want to cheer her on!

Penny’s from Galar too, so I couldn’t help but feel
a connection.
I won’t let your cheers go to waste, Florian!

I wanna support everyone during their time at
the academy too, so I started a cheer club!
You two wanna join?
Oh yeah! Clubs!
I want to, but...

I’m so busy with my research, I don’t know if I’ll
have time.
Research?

Yup! People of all regions are gathered here on
Pasio, right?

So I want to research strange phenomena and
folklore from all over the world!
I guess one could call it paranormal studies!
Interesting!

So why don’t you just make a paranormal studies
club, Florian?

Aha! If I work with fellow enthusiasts, we could
become friends!

Then you gotta talk to our teachers. You’ll need a
club supervisor!
Yeah, I’ll talk to them right away! Thanks, Marnie!
I wonder who could be our supervisor.
Wow! A paranormal club? Sounds exciting!

I’ll give you an application form. All you have to
do is fill in the required fields and hand it in.
As for your supervisor... I wish I could, but...
No worries! Thanks for your time!

Sorry. Besides my teaching, I have my Pokémon
research too, so...
Florian!
I’d be happy to do it, if you like!
What?! Really?

Yeah. Besides, I might be able to help you out,
considering your club’s theme.

Morty teaches classes on Ghost-type Pokémon and
Johto myths.
With his knowledge, he’d make a great supervisor!

That’d be fantastic! I’d love to have you as a
supervisor!
Happy to help! Looking forward to it, Florian!
Sounds like Typhlosion will help, too.
Wow! What a strange aura your Pokémon has!
That Pokémon...

I met this Typhlosion in a “space-time distortion”
that occurred on Pasio.

We formed a sync pair thanks to the help of other
Hisui Trainers.
Space-time distortion... I’ve heard of that!

That’s when time and space from different points
align, causing powerful wild Pokémon to appear!

It seems strange phenomena like that happen
often on Pasio.

I’d love to research stuff like that in our
paranormal club!
That’s the spirit!
A few days later...
Congrats, Florian!
I heard the club got approved!
Yeah! Now we can get things rolling!
I’m gonna recruit more members right away!
Sounds like things are picking up, Florian!

We’ve already gotten a few requests from folks
interested in joining.
Hey, club president! Hey, Morty! I’ll help recruit!
The club already has members, eh?
I’m Rei! Nice to meet ya!

By the way, have you heard about the seven
mysteries of Pasio Academy?

The academy’s only just opened, but stories are
already spreading among the students.

Looks like we already have a great research
topic—before we even have many members!
Hahaha! You’re right!
All right, club! Time for our first project!
You got this!
I’ll be cheerin’ you on with everything I got!
How’s the club goin’, Florian?
It’s great!

We’re slowly getting more mysteries to research—
and more members!

Florian and the others have been working so
earnestly, it’s been rewarding for me too.
Great! Glad you’re havin’ fun!

We have so many topics to research, both inside
and outside the academy!
Which are you most curious about?

Let’s see... Maybe the mystery motorcyclist that
appears in the schoolyard at night?
Oh... That’s become a rumor?
Huh? Do you know something about it?
Sorry. That might’ve started ’cause of me.
I’ve been practicing riding Cyclizar!

Wha—?! So the mystery motorcyclist isn’t actually
paranormal?!
Looks like another academy mystery solved!
